name: mocha-beautiful sky style
description:
使你的天空充满力量。

推荐权重为0.5到1，

同时，当构图包含天空时，这个lora能够提高背景占画面的比重，所以也可以作为良好的构图调节方法。

个人在多个模型上测试，都取得了不错的效果。

例图的模型是9527，可以在本站获取，当然你也可以轻松找到比它更好的画背景的模型。

Make your sky full of power.

The recommended weight is 0.5 to 1,

At the same time, when the composition includes the sky, this lora can increase the proportion of the background in the picture, so it can also be used as a good composition adjustment method.

Individual tests on multiple models have achieved good results.

The model of the example is 9527, which can be obtained on this website. Of course, you can easily find a better model for drawing the background.
